title: Easter Sunday bombings marked three years on
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Three years ago people were celebrating Easter in churches across the country.
Church bells have rung out across Sri Lanka, marking three years since 269 people were killed by a group of suicide bombers who targeted Churches, Hotels, Restaurants, while SCO
Although 1095 days have passed since the attack, justice has NOT YET been served for the victims of the terror attacks.
Several events were organized on Thursday (21), to remember the lives that were lost.
(VIDEO) What exactly happened in #Rambukkana that claimed the life of a protestor?
